- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- Build IsdaPresyo as a mobile-friendly fish price reference system.
- Frontend: HTML + Bootstrap + JS
- Backend: Node.js + Express
- DB: PostgreSQL (fits requirement of MySQL OR PostgreSQL)
- API: REST JSON endpoints, role-based access

- [x] Scaffold the Project
- Created `backend/` + `frontend/` structure.

- [x] Customize the Project
- Implemented REST API + JWT auth + validation + audit logging.
- Added Bootstrap-based public UI + hidden admin UI.

- [x] Install Required Extensions
- No extensions required.

- [x] Compile the Project
- Installed backend dependencies (`backend/npm install`).

- [x] Create and Run Task
- Added VS Code task to run `backend` in dev mode.

- [ ] Launch the Project
